author: Anish Bhalerao
comment: This has been my watchface for over 2 months now, and will continue to be. The only thing that annoys me, though, is that it reads "past eight" even if it is 8:15. The dev can try and implement "quarter past eight" for 8:11 through 8:20, and "quarter to nine" for "8:41 to 8:50". Makes more sense than "past eight", and gives slightly more information, whilst keeping everything else simple.

author: Brendan O'Dea
comment: Love it.  I initially installed this just for a lark, but have ended up using it as my primary watch face: turns out that in the majority of cases the time it presents is just about as accurate as I need, and for the remainder I can always squint at the precise time at the top of the screen.

author: Daniel Mendiola
comment: Great idea! Just one issue, in my Sony sw3 the do not disturb/charging icon overlaps a little bit the hour, could be awesome if you include language selection, like Spanish hehe.
title: This is good.

author: Lee McGuire
comment: My favourite watchface of all time. It can be a little too vague sometimes saying it's half past all the way up to quarter to.
title: Love it

author: Simon Murray
comment: Installed and disappeared. No where to be found on my phone or watch.

author: Karl Keegan
comment: I really want this.  It's downloaded and installed.  But doesn't appear in my phone or on my watch.  Using a gear 2. Help!!!

author: Matthew Brunelle
comment: Easy to read, low impact on watch battery and is a great conversation starter. Regular get complements on it at work as a fun watch face.
I love this watch face, feel much more relaxed about time :-)

author: Kev Keith
comment: Love it, though would like to switch the time and date to the awake screen, seems to make more sense.

author: Jeff Zidman
comment: Awesome app!  Only wish you could change the resolution to nearest quarter hour.

author: john wildish
comment: Dev - Please release this on tizen. Pleeaassseee.. :-) i would pay for it.

author: Eric Kaiser
comment: But not for me personally. Works as expected
title: Good for someone

author: Michael F
comment: Fun, but lacks ISO 8601

author: peter kay
comment: It makes me smile :) the hobbit bit is a bit iffy, all I have outside mealtimes is a green front door but the main function option is just ace.
title: I love it

author: John Lawless
comment: Very impressive.
title: Love it

author: Chops Miller
comment: But this watchface is awesome. Dev... Can you make this for phone, pleeeeeeeease?!? I'd pay for it

reply.author: derfreimann
reply.content: hihihi, you mean like a widget? I'll see what I can do ;)

title: not normally one to write reviews...

author: G Hall
comment: Love the idea! Would be perfect with more customisation on the ambient mode and a range of options on how relaxed an approach you want to take to time.

reply.author: derfreimann
reply.content: Sounds like a great idea - I'll definetly look into it! :D

title: Great idea

author: Melanie Dillon
comment: New addition of the Hobbit mealtimes in Timish makes it great for Lord of the Rings and Hobbit fans!  Really fun and you'll never miss a meal again!
title: Great add!

author: GGANNO
comment: Needs an option for U.S. Date Format.

reply.author: derfreimann
reply.content: auto date format is now available (@v2.2) - thanks a lot for the input! ^^

title: Date Format

author: Ed Holmes
comment: Very nice.

author: sarah hurworth
comment: Please make this as a widget!!!!! I don't use my watch much because I'm clumsy as heck but I love it!
Download but can't find it anywhere
